sentence.Network_en: He described the killing as a dastardly act.
sentence.Network_cn: 他把这起谋杀称为极其卑劣的行为。

sentence.Network_en: My first part was Captain O'Hagarty, a dastardly villain in a children's play.
sentence.Network_cn: 我演的第一个角色是奥哈格蒂船长，一部儿童剧中的恶棍。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2012年新GRE考试新增词汇（1）_新东方网 ... dank a. 潮湿的 dastardly a. 懦弱的，欺善怕恶的,卑鄙的 debonair a. 殷勤有礼的.
网络创世纪《Ultima Online》上手指南 ... Dishonorable（ 可耻的） Dastardly（ 卑鄙的） Alchemy（ 炼金术）：1钵1杵，4空瓶，4 …
2012年新GRE考试新增词汇（1）_新东方网 ... dank a. 潮湿的 dastardly a. 懦弱的，欺善怕恶的,卑鄙的 debonair a. 殷勤有礼的.

list.abs: I think , however , that the killing of Bin Laden will motivate extremists to carry out a variety of dastardly deeds .然而，我认为杀死本拉登会导致很多极端分子实施各种卑鄙的行为。
dastard 懦夫dastardliness 懦弱的行为dastardly 懦弱的
daring act 大胆的行动dastardly act 卑劣的行为dauntless act 大无畏的行动

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'dull or stupid'): from dastard in the obsolete sense 'base coward'

entry.def: If you describe an action as dastardly, you mean it is wicked and intended to hurt someone.

example.ex: He described the killing as a dastardly act.
example.tran: 他把这起谋杀称为极其卑劣的行为。

entry.def: If you describe a person as dastardly, you mean they are wicked.

example.ex: ...the heiress who is badly treated by her dastardly uncle.
example.tran: 受到歹毒的叔叔虐待的女继承人

sentences.sentence: "the unprovoked and dastardly attack by Japan on...December 7th"- F.D. Roosevelt

auth_sentence.content: He described the bombing as a dastardly action.
auth_sentence.res_content: He described the bombing as a dastardly action.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He described the bombing as a dastardly action.

auth_sentence.content: Just the Rooneys of the future - and they were a dastardly lot.
auth_sentence.res_content: Just the Rooneys of the future - and they were a dastardly lot.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Just the Rooneys of the future - and they were a dastardly lot.

auth_sentence.content: You might see more traditionally dastardly Captain Hooks than Stuart Mcloughlin's shaven-headed Scotsman.
auth_sentence.res_content: You might see more traditionally dastardly Captain Hooks than Stuart Mcloughlin's shaven-headed Scotsman.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You might see more traditionally dastardly Captain Hooks than Stuart Mcloughlin's shaven-headed Scotsman.
